sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import { Container, Row, Col, Button, Card, CardBody, CardTitle, Modal, ModalHeader, ModalBody, ModalFooter, Media, Table, NavItem, } from "reactstrap"; import classnames from "classnames"; import stateWrapper from "../../../containers/provider"; import instance from "../../../helpers/axiosly"; //Import Breadcrumb import Breadcrumbs from "../../../components/Common/Breadcrumb"; //i18n import { withNamespaces } from "react-i18next"; import AvForm from "availity-reactstrap-validation/lib/AvForm"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import RecentClient from './RecentClient'; import RecentWithdrawal from './RecentWithdrawal' const AdminDashboard = (props) => { const[users, setUsers] = useState([]) const[projects, setProjecs] = useState([]); const[withdrawal, setWithdrawal] = useState([]) const[librarys, setLibrarys] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { let userData = props.userStore.fetchUser(props); async function fetchData(){ try { const token = localStorage.getItem("token") const resUser = await instance .get(`${process.env.REACT_APP_DATABASEURL}/user`, { headers: { Authorization: `Bearer ${token}`, }, }) setUsers(resUser.data.data.rows) const resProject = await instance .get(`${process.env.REACT_APP_DATABASEURL}/project`, { headers: { Authorization: `Bearer ${token}`, }, }) setProjecs(resProject.data.data.rows) const resWithdrawal = await instance .get(`${process.env.REACT_APP_DATABASEURL}/withdrawal`, { headers: { Authorization: `Bearer ${token}`, }, }) setWithdrawal(resWithdrawal.data.data.rows) const resLib = await props.masterStore.fetchLibrary( userData.access_token ); setLibrarys(props.masterStore.state.sessionData.libraryList) } catch (e) { console.log(e); } } fetchData(); //eslint-disable-line }, []) const client = users.filter(user => user.RoleId === 2) const writer = users.filter(user => user.RoleId === 3) //let librarys = props.masterStore.state.sessionData.libraryList; return (
{/* Render Breadcrumb */}

Client Count

{`${client.length}`}
View

Writer Count

{`${writer.length}`}
View

Total User

{`${writer.length + client.length}`}
View

Withdrawal Request

{``}

Project Count

{`${projects.length}`}

Library Count

{`${librarys && librarys.length}`}
); }; export default withNamespaces()(stateWrapper(AdminDashboard));
